story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Waucheesi Bike Race land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Waucheesi Bike Race? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Waucheesi Bike Race scored 51 out of 100. Solid tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Waucheesi Bike Race?
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Waucheesi Bike Race. Tellico Plains, Tennessee. 75 mi. Appalachian mountain gravel with challenging climbing.
beats.text_on_screen: Waucheesi Bike Race | Tellico Plains, Tennessee | 75 mi
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: The numbers. All fourteen of them. Elevation. 4 out of 5. Mountain passes on the menu. The 88-mile 'Wily' route delivers 11,500+ feet of climbing while the 63-mile 'Wondrous' option packs 8,800+ feet of elevation gain. Length. 3 out of 5. Long enough to matter. Short enough to recover. Three distance options (45, 63, 88 miles) with strict cutoffs at 24-mile (1:00pm) and 45-mile (2:30pm) splits that force shorter routes if missed. Technicality. 3 out of 5. Technical enough to thin the pack. Course features 'rowdy gravel' through Cherokee and Nantahala National Forests with named challenges including Basin Gap and North River Road climbs. Adventure. 3 out of 5. Genuine adventure elements. Expect the unexpected. Routes traverse Cherokee and Nantahala National Forests with 'amazing vistas' along the Cherohala Skyway and Bald River area. Experience. 3 out of 5. The experience justifies the entry fee. Finish line at Tellico Grains Bakery creates a community atmosphere where riders can cheer finishers while enjoying wood-fired pizzas and craft beverages. Community. 3 out of 5. Community is a real selling point. Finish line at the local bakery where riders gather to cheer finishers creates an intimate community feel enhanced by wood-fired pizzas and craft beverages. Value. 3 out of 5. Reasonable price for what's offered. Gets you 75 miles of Appalachian gravel with elevation for what appears to be reasonable regional pricing. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Mid-range expenses. Budget a proper race weekend.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: And the rest of the scorecard. Logistics. 2 out of 5. Functional. Not impressive. Climate. 2 out of 5. Weather cooperates more often than not. Prestige. 2 out of 5. Regional reputation. The locals know. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Basic but functional. Gets the job done. Field Depth. 2 out of 5. Modest field. Some fast riders in the mix. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Oxygen plentiful. Power output normal.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.narration: What Waucheesi Bike Race gets right.
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment
beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Fly into: Chattanooga 1.5 hours or Knoxville 1.5 hours
Lodging: Tellico Plains has limited lodging. Cleveland or Chattanooga have more options.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Remote Appalachian Mountain Gravel. If you're in Tennessee and want a remote mountain challenge. yes, it's a solid regional event. If you're from out of state. there are better options.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Waucheesi Bike Race isn't quite right for you. For better Southeast events: Gravel Worlds, Pisgah Monster-Cross, Hot Springs Gravel Gauntlet. For similar regional events: other Tennessee gravel races.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Waucheesi Bike Race? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic reveal pose, tier badge prominent, 'Waucheesi Bike Race' bold text, tier badge 'SOLID', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
